message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it will bring to you, I propose a special introductory price of $11000. This offer is exclusive to you and is valid for the next 48 hours. Don't miss this opportunity to secure a valuable asset at an attractive discount. If you have any questions or need more information, please feel free to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response!
